content: At the end of the third quarter, the size of our investment portfolio at fair value was $2.3 billion across a highly diversified set of 130 portfolio companies operating across 32 different industries. As of September 30, 70% of the investment portfolio at fair value was invested in first lien debt, 4% in second lien debt, 2% subordinated debt, 3% in preferred equity, 9% in common equity interest and 12% across our joint ventures, including 10% in the International Senior Loan Program and 2% in the Senior Loan Program. ISLP's investment portfolio at fair value as of September 30 was approximately $623 million, comprised of investments in 34 portfolio companies operating across 15 different industries. As of September 30, SLP's investment portfolio at fair value was approximately $571 million, comprised of investments in 51 portfolio companies operating across 22 different industries.
